global_caption: a scene featuring a man standing, holding a white paper bag, wearing black sunglasses, a watch, a white shirt, beiji pants, and black shoes, watching the right side; a woman standing, holding a red coffee in her left hand, drawing a grey carrier, wearing a flower-patterned white short-sleeved shirt and blue shorts; a man wearing a green short-sleeved shirt, beiji shorts, a watch around his left hand, and black shoes, watching the right side; a woman wearing a sky blue one-piece dress, taking a picture with her smartphone, watching the phone screen to take the picture, holding a beiji hat in her left hand, and wearing sandals.
